(artefacts[0]) * artefacts[1];

item.title: PK Points Exchange
item.dc:creator: @yvesdv yvesdv
item.description:
@yvesdv wrote:

I got this code:

case 9157:
int[][] artefacts = {
{14876,25000000},{14877,20000000},{14878,15000000},{14879,10000000},{14880,5000000},{14881,2500000}};
for(int i = 0; i < artefacts.length; i++) {
if(c.dialogueAction == 9999) {
c.getItems().addItem(995, c.getItems().getItemCount(artefacts[i][0]) * artefacts[i][1]);
c.getItems().deleteItem(artefacts[i][0], c.getItems().getItemCount(artefacts[i][0]));
c.sendMessage(“Mandrith pays in cash.”);
}

now I wanted the coins he gave for the artefacts into PKP and made this:

		case 9157:
		int[][] artefacts = {
			{14876,50},{14877,45},{14878,40},{14879,25},{14880,20},{14881,20}};
		for(int i = 0; i < artefacts.length; i++) {
		if(c.dialogueAction == 9999) {
			c.getItems().(c.PKP++, c.getItems().getItemCount(artefacts[i][0]) * artefacts[i][1]);
			c.getItems().deleteItem(artefacts[i][0], c.getItems().getItemCount(artefacts[i][0]));	 
			c.sendMessage("Mandrith pays you PKP");
		}

and got this error.

src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:763: error:
xpected
c.getItems().(c.PKP++, c.getItems().getItemCoun
(artefacts[i][0]) * artefacts[i][1]);
^
1 error
Press any key to continue…

can anyone correct this for me please?

Thanks!

Read full topic
